title: Howard Stern Wack History Month (Eric The Midget-Actor)
description:
Howard Stern Wack History Month (Eric The Midget/Actor)  (05:57:00)

Hosted by Steve-O, this special focus' on Eric Shaun Lynch, aka 'Eric The Midget/Actor. Discussion of who belongs on a Wack Pack Mount Rushmore will always garner a wide variety of names but any true Howard Stern fan knows that Eric the Actor should surely be included. At just 3 feet, 5 inches, Eric was the littlest member of the Wack Pack but his small frame packed a lot of opinions. Eric the Actor (nÃ©e Midget) first called into the show in 2002 to tell Howard what a big Kelly Clarkson fan he was, at that time a contestant on "American Idol." With Howard's help, Eric's dream of being an actor became a reality with small parts on TV shows like "American Dreams," "In Plain Sight," and "Fringe." All of those programs have since gone off the air, leading some to call Eric a "show killer". One show that was undeniably better with Eric's presence though was the Stern Show.
In September 2014, we lost Eric. Our little guy died from heart failure at 39 years old. We will miss his calls, we will miss his cantankerousness, and we will miss his ability to make millions of people smile. Bye for now, Eric.


PART 1 

* First Call.
* Sal Rings Eric Claiming To Work For Speilberg Phoney Phone Call.


PART 2

* Top 10 Midgets Of All Time Poll. (skit)
* Eric Is Pranked By Carrie Underwood & Wants A Date.
* Eric The Midget/Actor Trivia Question.


PART 3

* Eric The Midget/Actor Trivia Answer.
* You Know What To Do!
* 'Dirty Eric' Movie (skit)


PART 4

* Eric Sings 'Wild Thing'. (song)
* Eric The Midget loses His Virginity.
* 'Everybody Dance Now' & Eric Mashup. (song)
 

PART 5

* Eric The Midget's First Live Appearance.
* Diana DeGarmo's Publicist Phoney Phone Call To Eric.


PART 6

* Eric The Midget Vs. Steve Langford, Zero Point Zero.
* Eric's American Idol Show & Johnny Fratto Relationship.


PART 7

* Inside The Actor Studio With Eric The Midget. (skit)
* Eric's Angry Voicemail For Gary & Wack Pack Test.
* Eric The Actor Trivia Question.


PART 8

* Eric The Actor Trivia Answer.
* Eric's 'In Plain Sight' Negotiations.
* 'A Midget Werewolf In Albuquerque' Movie Promo. (skit)
* 'Werewolves In New Mexico' Parody. (Song)


PART 9

* Sarah Silverman On Why She Loved Eric.
* Eric Enters The Homo Room.
* Derek From Texas Calls In. A Midget In Disguise?
* Eric's Weird Twitter Follows & Tweets.
* Howard & Friends Pay Tribute To Eric 'The Actor' Lynch
